org.dejava.component.i18n.message.handler

Interface MessageHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ApplicationMessageHandler
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultI18nMessageHandler

    public interface MessageHandler
extends Serializable
    Helps handling internationalization messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMessage(ApplicationMessageType type, String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Gets a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
      String getMessage(String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Gets a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
      String getMessage(String type, String key, Object[] parametersValues)
      Gets a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.

    • Method Detail

      • getMessage

        String getMessage(String key,
                Object[] parametersValues)
                  throws MessageNotFoundException,
                         org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException
        Gets a message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Parameters:
        key - Key for the message in the bundle.
        parametersValues - Parameter values for the message.
        Returns:
        A message with the given key and parameters values of the defined type.
        Throws:
        MessageNotFoundException - If the message cannot be found.
        org.dejava.component.exception.localized.unchecked.InvalidParameterException - If any of the parameters values are not valid.
